summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4538 for the improvement of 9th Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Garfield Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53097, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
